events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week, as it doesn't fit me and I want to return it.
The refund request was identified and the case was categorized under 'Refund' to proceed accordingly.
An agent from the refund support team was assigned to handle the customer's request regarding the return process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn or damaged at all.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket, and once received, we will process your refund promptly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the jacket.
We have received the returned jacket and completed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the refund to reflect.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and are satisfied with how your return was handled. Let us know if we can assist further.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
